entities.name: rita skeeter
entities.description: Rita Skeeter is mentioned as the author of 'RITA SKEETER'S SCOOP'.

entities.name: bagman
entities.description: Bagman is a person who is present at the Three Broomsticks on a weekend when there is no Triwizard event.

entities.name: goblins
entities.description: Goblins are mentioned as being present at the Three Broomsticks and looking menacing.

relationships.description: Bagman is mentioned together with Rita Skeeter's Scoop.
Bagman interacted with the goblins at the Three Broomsticks.
